comments: This contract was competitively sourced; For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department. SIGMA requires informatics professional services to support the continuous improvement of SIGMA Business Intelligence BI and the roll-out of Dashboards and Enhanced Reporting more user-friendly and web-like interface.
